title: Digital Transformation, the Sentient Web and Cognitive Agents
summary: Framing the aims and challenges for the Digital Transformation of industry, the emergence of the Sentient Web and new approaches to cognitive agents based upon decades of progress in Cognitive Psychology that pave the way for a new paradigm for AI, focusing on human oriented computing. slides
goals: Introduce the W3C to opportunities for addressing Digital Transformation with graph data and rules, together with highly scalable graph algorithms and AI/ML
